All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChatObservable
The ChatObservable class manages a list of ChatObserver objects and notifies them of changes.
ChatObserver
The ChatObserver interface should be implemented by any class that wishes to be notified of updates from a ChatObservable.
CoordinatesLoader
The CoordinatesLoader class is responsible for loading and managing 2D coordinates.
DecorEntity
The DecorEntity class represents a non-living decorative entity in the game.
DecorType
The DecorType enum represents different types of decorative entities in the game.
Direction
The Direction enum represents the possible movement directions for entities in the game.
DisplayChat
The DisplayChat class is responsible for displaying chat messages in a scrollable pane.
DisplayInventory
DisplayInventory is responsible for rendering the player's inventory in a GridPane.
Entity
The Entity class represents a generic entity in the game with a location, weight, direction, type, and sprite manager.
EntityLoader
The EntityLoader class is responsible for loading entities from a file and adding them to the entity manager.
EntityManager
The EntityManager class manages entities within a game map, handling their addition, removal, movement, and interactions.
EntitySprite
Enum representing different entity sprites for various directions.
GlobalChat
The GlobalChat class manages the global chat messages and notifies observers of any changes.
GridManager
The GridManager class is responsible for managing the grid layout and updating the visual representation of the game world.
Inventory
The Inventory class represents an inventory that can hold items in a grid.
Item
The Item class represents an item in the game with attributes such as durability, maximum durability, name, and template.
ItemEntity
The ItemEntity class represents a non-living entity that contains an item.
ItemTemplate
The ItemTemplate enum represents different types of items in the game.
ItemType
The ItemType enum represents different types of items in the game.
Launcher
The Launcher class is the main entry point for the Level One game application.
LivingEntity
The LivingEntity class represents a living entity in the game with various attributes such as health, armor, strength, and magic.
MapLoader
The MapLoader class is responsible for loading a map from a file.
MapType
The MapType enum defines different types of maps in the game.
Monster
The Monster class represents a monster entity in the game, which is a type of LivingEntity.
MonsterType
The MonsterType enum represents different types of monsters in the game and their corresponding inventory items.
NonLivingEntity
The NonLivingEntity class represents a non-living entity in the game.
NPC
The NPC class represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game.
NPCType
The NPCType enum represents different types of NPCs in the game and their corresponding attributes.
Observer
The Observer interface should be implemented by any class that wishes to be notified of updates from an Observable.
Player
The Player class represents a player character in the game.
PlayerController
The PlayerController class handles player movement and actions based on keyboard input.
PlayerInventory
The PlayerInventory class represents the player's inventory, including the hotbar and selected item functionalities.
Point2D
The Point2D class represents a point in a 2D coordinate system.
RandomMovementManager
The RandomMovementManager class handles the random movement of entities such as monsters and NPCs within the game.
SceneManager
The SceneManager class is responsible for managing different scenes in the game.
SpriteManager
The SpriteManager class is responsible for managing and updating the sprite images for entities.
TileDesignManager
The TileDesignManager class is responsible for creating and managing the design of tiles in the game.
